Title: Inception
Description: A skilled thief leads a team into people's dreams to steal secrets.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns the world is a simulation and joins a rebellion.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Description: Steve Rogers teams up with Black Widow to battle a new threat from within S.H.I.E.L.D.

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Description: Captain America and Iron Man lead opposing factions of the Avengers over government oversight.

Title: Maze Runner
Description: A young man wakes up in a mysterious maze with no memory and must find a way out.

Title: Silent Voice
Description: A young man seeks redemption by reconnecting with a deaf girl he once bullied.

Title: Isle of Dogs
Description: In a dystopian future, a boy searches for his lost dog on an island inhabited by exiled canines.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Description: A laundromat owner is swept into an insane adventure where she alone can save existence by exploring other universes.

Title: The Platform
Description: In a future dystopia, prisoners housed in vertical cells watch as inmates in the upper cells are fed while those below starve.

Title: The Amazing Spider-Man
Description: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city.

Title: Gifted
Description: A single man raises his niece, a child prodigy, and faces a custody battle with his mother.

Title: I'm Not Here
Description: A man reflects on his life and the choices that led him to where he is now.
